name: Domestication of Divine Beasts at the Beginning
author: 青云阁
content: All races have invaded Earth. Su Bai’s pet turtle evolved into the Black Tortoise , and his cat into the White Tiger . The Vermilion Bird and Azure Dragon , ancient sacred beasts, soon followed. However, these divine beasts have enormous appetites, which led Su Bai to become a notorious businessman that gives everyone headaches.“Brother, this is Black Tortoise blood, only selling for a mere ten billion.
